Wnmp 2.0.5 ********** - Wnmp Control Panel 2.1.0
* Fixed #17, Bug with config and log button menu items. * Fixed #18, Wnmp shows two windows when an update if found. * Fixed incorrect windows edition definitions
- Nginx
* Updated to 1.5.8
- phpMyAdmin
* Updated to 4.1.2
